MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5  postcode area of Johnstone, affecting properties in Hagg Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 10:36AM. Our engineers are on their way to Hagg Road to investigate and a repair a suspected blown fuse our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11AM on 28 November 2020.
